怎么说呢，玩了200多小时，一直在白银四，为什么？队友太伞兵了，就拿今天的一句举例子，我让他丢火封a大，他和我说，丢你（）啊。我真的，哎，然后就是挂太多，优先也有挂，太离谱了

Great game play. You really have to be quick on the trigger, and more important, to point the sight to the target. Sometimes i feel like i have a bullet magnet in my head. 
Dislikes is, that it should be a game where all are equal, and some spend few hours playing while others use whole days playing. I often meet rude and aggresive players, and if you do not spend your life in here - you are sure to be voted out because you are not as good as the others. In my oppinion this voting should only be used to get rid of rude players (it is only a game). 
Graphic is great sounds are great, well the whole game is great. Only thing is, that it could be more realistic when compared to real life where i have served in the army, posted in places as Kosovo and Afghanistan. No way you can empty a clip in the face of an opponent, he survive and use one bullet and you are dead. (specially not when you see replay and his sight is not close to your head), and with fragmentation west and helmet, you will not be standing after taking a hit, (it still hurts like hell).
But again, it is a game.

One thing i miss, is that you in the game can report rude players and you do not have to remember the name of the player, and look his steam profile up after.

Now - time to continue and have a great and fun time!

Es ist Zwar nervig das man ab und zu Cheater Bekommt die nicht mal fürs spinn boten gebannt werden aber sonnst ein geiles spiel hab schon so einige Nächte  durch gemacht weil ich die zeit aus den Augen verloren hab aber sehr zu Empfelen wäre Prime da non-Prime nur Cheater sind meiner Meinung Nach :P Schaut es euch gerne mal an ist ein Gutes Spiel zum lange Zocken oder mal zwischen durch.
